title: T-206 lot of 5 Southern Leaguer's FS
author: smokeyjoewood

posts.post_title: T-206 lot of 5 Southern Leaguer's FS
posts.post_content:
Lot of 5 T206 southern leaguers.  Revelle, Ryan, Howard, Persons, Coles. Only those 5 for sale.  Please check scans for condition.  The Coles has an erased pencil mark near the top, hard to pick up via scans. $310 shipped for the lot.  These will be shipped from Canada so they may be held up at customs and take up to a few weeks for delivery.  Email with any interest.  I haven't been active since the old board as far as selling/posting so ask around if you must.    Regards, Paul $tratton 

[url]rare.card.collector@gmail.com[/url]
